EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Valued LegalZoom Customer,
Thank you for your recent inquiry. In regards to your question, an irrevocable trust is a trust that may not be terminated. By contrast, a revocable trust may be amended or terminated by the person who created it.
LegalZoom offers three types of revocable Living Trusts: Individual Living Trusts, which are designed for one person, for a price of $249; Joint Living Trusts, which are designed for any two persons, married or not, for a price of $249; AB Living Trusts which are designed only for a married couple to reduce federal estate taxes for a price of $249.
To check for pricing information in the future, please visit www.legalzoom.com, select the desired document on the left-hand side of the homepage, and click on the ?Check Pricing? tab on the document overview page.
I have included a complimentary ?Living Trust Guide? to help you become more familiar with LegalZoom's Living Trusts.
Please call us toll-free at (800) 962-7490 if we can be of further assistance. We look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
